cookingTips: Select truly green bananas that are firm; ripe bananas will fall apart during cooking
Peel green bananas while wearing gloves as the latex-like sap can stain hands
Simmer gently to allow bananas to soften without breaking apart
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user on identifying and properly handling green bananas, and explain how the coconut milk creates a creamy base that complements their mild, starchy flavor.
